document_type: Transmittal Slip, Overseas Processing Sheet, Travel Order, Request for Personnel Action
summary: This document contains a transmittal slip, overseas processing sheets, travel orders, and a request for personnel action related to Lucien E. Conein. The documents detail his travel plans to Saigon, Athens, and Frankfurt, security clearances, and reassignment within the agency.
title: Lucien E. Conein Travel and Personnel Records
